title: The Most important question in the world
creator_credit: Paul Young, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: When Paul Young went to university, he knew he didn’t want to be a teacher. However, over time, he has seen the value of the profession and learnt that it’s not about the content, it’s about the life lessons.
